title: Shopping Bag, Bloomingdale's: A Celebration of One Hundred Years of International Style 1886-1986, 1986
title_raw: Bloomingdale's: A Celebration of One Hundred Years of International Style 1886-1986
inscribed: Imprinted in white, center: "1886/ A CELEBRATION /OF / ONE/ HUNDRED/ YEARS/ OF / INTERNATIONAL/ STYLE/ 1986".
creditline: Gift of Willa and Joseph Rosenberg
description: Recto: red with gold outline drawing of building. Verso: blue with same gold drawing of building. Right side panel: abstract map/grid in blue and gold, with "The World of Bloomingdale's" imprinted, the "O" in "World" assuming the form of a globe. Left side panel: same design in red and gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shopping Bag, Bloomingdale's: A Celebration of One Hundred Years of International Style 1886-1986, 1986. Paper; black plastic handles.. 
Gift of Willa and Joseph Rosenberg. 1999-34-3
